item.title: Training a SpaCy Text Classifier on Supreme Court Opinions: Classifying Opinions by Century
item.description: Continuing some work with the Supreme Court databases I’ve been fiddling around with lately, I was wondering if I could get a machine learning model to be able to correctly identify and classify a Supreme Court opinion by the decade in which it was written. So let’s grab some data and see what we can do! There is a really wonderful github repo that contains the .json files of all the Supreme Court cases made available through the CourtListener API.
